item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=132702466815109

Please bring undecided voters with you!

from politico:

8:30 - 9:30 AM Meeting with supporters at Breakfast at Mary Ann’s Diner 29 East Broadway, Derry, N.H.

9:45 - 10 AM Meeting with supporters at Business Visit and Meet & Greet at Derry Feed 3 Martin Street, Derry, N.H.

10:05 - 10:15 AM Meeting with supporters at Al’s Gun & Reel Shop 5 Linwood Avenue, Derry, N.H.

10:35 -10:45 AM Meeting with supporters at Rockingham Acres 161 Rockingham Road, Derry, N.H.

11 - 11:15 AM Business visit at Windham Farms Fruit & Produce 55 Range Road Windham, N.H.

11:20 - 11:45 AM Hosting a press conference at Village Bean 33 Indian Rock Road, Windham, N.H.

2 - 3:30 PM Speaking with conservative activists at Nesmith Library 8 Fellows Road, Windham, N.H.

4 - 4:15 PM Meeting with supporters at Mike’s Red Barn 301 Main Street, Salem, N.H.

4:20 - 4:30 PM Meeting with supporters at Chocolate Moose 184 N Broadway, Salem, N.H.
item.name: Ron Paul returns to NH!
